TopicTitle: fun to watch heavy lift sub assembly.

Articles.Content:
I started out just trying to make something fun to watch launch. I ended up with something that may tax some of your computers to the breaking point but only for the first couple of stages. depending on what you are trying to launch with it. enjoy. this is completely stock craft. although I do have mechjeb on the return capsule. can start your turn at 10km or even 9, I have yet to really break it. other than just having too many parts on the top of it to break the game lol.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6v2ldb7hxfkd2un/BIG%20lift%20lots%20of%20DV.craft?dl=0 put this in your sub assembly under the save you wish to use it in.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3bngxo9tb7uc6yd/screenshot16.png?dl=0 pic

Edited January 8, 2015 by raidersc
uploading pics
No pics? No trusted download. Can you post a pic?

The horror, the lag!!!!!

All dem SRB particle effects are gonna melt my laptop's GPU. Why must my desktop be under maintenance!?!?!?!?!
I'm curious how much I can actually lift into orbit with this. Science anyone?
My 850 part Cira VI Is kind of like that - a monster in VAB and on launch.

I could of made it more efficient but I wanted to do something I hadn't done before with staging. was mainly trying to make something that could lift anything I wanted several times over and enjoy watching it launch over and over. so far I have not been disappointed. hope you guys enjoy it as much as I do. thanks for your feedback.
